text: so a data center is a place that kind of
looks like a warehouse that has power
cooling and servers
in it
a data center protects the computer that
run the world
to put it in simple words the cloud is
the internet
it's all the things you can access
remotely over the internet
so before i worked in the data center i
was in school for 18 months studying in
telecommunications
at the same time i was working part-time
at the airport in a retail store as a
sales associate
where is the aws data center situated
and i always give them the same answer
it's somewhere out there
[Music]
